product: Magneteyes Kajal with Almond Oil - Black 01
description:
The Faces Canada MagnetEyes kajal is the new age kohl you all need to make a bold statement! It is waterproof, fadeproof and does not smudge for upto 24hrs, so that you have gorgeous looking deep black eyes all day long.
 
 The MagnetEyes Kajal has one of its kind formulation and comes in retractable packaging for easy application and glides off easily on waterline and lids. The Faces Canada MagnetEyes Kajal is highly pigmented and is loaded with the nourishment of Vitamin-E, mineral and antioxidants and is free from parabens. The Faces Canada MagnetEyes Kajal is a multi-purpose 3-in-1 product that easily works as a Kajal, eye liner and even as a smokey eye shadow.
 
 Formulated in Germany, and tested dermatologically and ophthalmologically, this Kajal is suitable for everyone including contact lens users. Get intense black eyes that look fresh all day as if you have just applied the Kajal !
